sense.def:
To swallow something
pomeni potisniti nekaj iz ust v želodec.

seg.quote: Breen took a swallow of brandy.

sense.def:
To swallow
pomeni premakniti mišice v grlu, kot da bi nekaj pogoltnili, pogosto zato, ker smo vznemirjeni ali prestrašeni.

seg.quote: He swallowed and closed his eyes.

sense.def:
To swallow a story or a statement
pomeni popolnoma verjeti zgodbi ali trditvi.

seg.quote: I sometimes think that crowds will swallow whole any political speech whatsoever.

sense.def:
To swallow an insult or unkind remark
pomeni sprejeti žalitev ali neprijazno pripombo brez ugovarjanja.

seg.quote: She swallowed the sarcasm and got on with her work.

sense.def:
A swallow
je majhna ptica s koničastimi krili in škarjastim repom.
